body.name: MOROVOL PC Case Pre-Install 4 RGB Fans, ATX Gaming Computer Case with Diamond-Shaped Mesh Front & Tempered Glass Side Panel, USB 3.0 Airflow Mid Tower case,621
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 14 mins
features: 4PCS RGB Fans for Gifts - The 621 pc case is pre-installed with 4 RGB 120mm case fans, which are fixed RGB lighting capable and can provide considerable airflow to enhance cooling. (Note: The lighting is fixed, not addressable.)

Tempered Glass Side Panel - The Mid-tower case is designed with removable tempered glass side panel. The precise design makes this tower case both solid and beautiful. The glass side panel has high light transmittance, which can perfectly display your accessories. The removable glass side panel also makes it easy to install internal PC components.

Precise Design - Morovol 621-N4 computer case supports ATX / Micro-ATX / Mini-ITX, the GPU is up to 300mm, the PSU is up to 160mm and the CPU cooling height is up to 155mm. In addition, it can support to install 2 x 2.5 "SSDs + 2 x 3.5" HDDs.

Perfect Airflow - The diamond mesh front panel of this ATX case is the optimal cooling performance panel that features a stereo contour. While this case can provide amazingly high airflow, it can also showcase great lighting effects. So you don't have to worry about the heat dissipation during the operation of the chassis and enjoy it wantonly.

Excellent I/O Panel - The 621 gaming case provides fast and easy access to the I/O panel, with 1 USB 3.0 port (faster data transfer), 2 USB 2.0 ports, HD audio and microphone ports, reset and power button.

Cost-effective Case - Morovol 621-N4 gaming pc case is pre-installed with 4 fans. The mesh front panel provides strong airflow. The affordable price brings a surprise of high-performance chassis, which can meet the component needs of middle tower chassis enthusiasts.

No Risk of Purchase - If you have any problems with your case, please feel free to contact us by clicking "S0ld-by-MOROVOL" on the page and we will try our best to help you! MOROVOL strives to provide the best support to our customers!

Cost-effective Case - MOROVOL 621-N4 gaming pc case is pre-installed with 4 fans. The mesh front panel provides strong airflow. The affordable pay brings a surprise of high-performance chassis, which can meet the component needs of middle tower chassis enthusiasts.4PCS RGB Fans for Gifts - The 621 pc case is pre-installed with 4 RGB 120mm case fans, which are fixed RGB lighting capable and can provide considerable airflow to enhance cooling. (Note: The lighting is fixed, not addressable.)Perfect Airflow - The diamond mesh front panel of this ATX case is the optimal cooling performance panel that features a stereo contour. While this case can provide amazingly high airflow, it can also showcase great lighting effects. So you don't have to worry about the heat dissipation during the operation of the chassis and enjoy it wantonly.Tempered Glass Side Panel - The Mid-tower case is designed with removable tempered glass side panel. The precise design makes this tower case both solid and beautiful. The glass side panel has high light transmittance, which can perfectly display your accessories. The removable glass side panel also makes it easy to install internal PC components.

ATX case with Mesh Front Panel and Tempered Glass Side Panel MOROVOL PC case ultra-fine performance mesh front panel promotes great airflow and maintains lower system temperatures.Featureing a tempered Glass Side panel in a compact Mid-tower. Case included RGB fans flood the build with lighting.

Simple design. Save space. Excellent I/O Panel ----The 621 gaming case provides fast and easy access to the I/O panel, with 1 USB 3.0 port (faster data transfer), 2 USB 2.0 ports, HD audio and microphone ports, reset and power button.

More Details about the MOROVOL 621 series ATX tower PC case Maximum CPU Cooler Height 150 mm Maximum GPU Length 300 mm Maximum PSU Length ATX PSU, Max. Length 160 mm Drives Supports 2 x 2.5"SSD + 2 x 3.5''HDD Motherboard Compatibility ATX/ Micro-ATX/ Mini-ITX Cooling Method Air Expansion Slots 6 slots RGB Fans Support Front: 3 x 120 mm； Rear: 1 x 120 mm（Case with Pre-installed 4pcs Fans） Reminder about Fans Connect the fans header to the power header before turning on the power supply! (Prohibited turn on your power supply first.) Case Dimensions (HxLxW) 16.73" x 14.57" x 7.28" (425 x 370 x 185mm) Packing Weight 10.86 LB Package included 621-N4 case*1, RGB Fans *4, Manual *1, Screw accessories*1

How to install HDD in the 621 pc case? 1. Screw the screw through the rubber pad and lock it;2. Place the screws from the bottom up;3. The screw position is stuck forward;4. Screw the last screw to fixed.

R7 U3 852 621 Motherboard Support ATX / Micro-ATX / Mini-ITX ATX / Micro-ATX / Mini-ITX ATX / Micro-ATX / Mini-ITX ATX / Micro-ATX / Mini-ITX Filters Top and bottom Top and bottom X X Number Of Fans Pre-installed 4 Fix Color RGB Fans 2 Non-LED Fans 2 Non-LED Fans 4 Fix Color RGB Fans Drive Bays 3x2.5" SSD + 2x3.5" HDD 3x2.5" SSD + 1x3.5" HDD 2x2.5"SSD + 1x3.5''HDD + 1x5.25"ODD 2x2.5"SSD + 2x3.5''HDD Radiator Support Top: 120mm, Rear: 120mm Top: 280mm/240mm, Rear: 120mm X X

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: I was upgrading my CPU and mobo and decided to downsize from my full tower. This looked bigger in the photos which I wasn't super thrilled about. However, to my surprise, this thing is comparatively tiny. There isn't a ton of space to cable manage and it definitely takes some experience and patience but this is definitely the best bang for your buck mATX case out there. Airflow is better than my big ATX case and the glass panel door is such a great addition. It's small but can fit a full 160mm CPU cooler.Sidenote: I could not control the ARGB fans with my gigabyte motherboard because mine does not have a place to plug in the included VDG header.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute little case
reviews.reviewText: This little case fits right on the desk nicely. I like the door and it’s pretty easy to build in. I had to remove the drive bay to fit my power supply in, but putting it back in isn’t bad. It looks good. I will say the fact that the fans are molex connected instead of fan connections is a bit odd but the case is cheap enough that this is not too much of an issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is great
reviews.reviewText: It just small enough but quiet and works greateasy to install the main board with a lot of room to work with

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2021
reviews.reviewText: If you're on a budget this will do, keep an eye out for unmachined screw holes as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Case looks good and comes with the fans the only thing that doesn’t give it 5 stars is that the metal is a little thin other than that it’s great buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s Pepto pink
reviews.reviewText: Great little computer case. A little noisy but over all no complaints with cooling. Made it into a work station not a gaming case. Color is more of a matte color and resembles Pepto-Bismol pink. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recommended Compact PC case
reviews.reviewText: Chassis designed with enough ventilation to help keep the motherboard and peripherals cool with support for even more ventilation. Great look and lightweight. Comes with simple instructions. My only disappointment was that it has no accomodations for a DVD/Blu-Ray drive, but, then, again , this is 2022, right? Optical drives are not used much anymore, but can be added externally. Overall, recommended.
